document.full_text: after their game against the marlins was canceled, the mets put david wright on the disabled list. nick evans and ruben tejada have been called up from buffalo.
document.title: wright's injury prompts series of moves by mets
lines_and_colors: after their game against the marlins was canceled, the mets put david wright on the disabled list. nick evans and ruben tejada have been called up from buffalo.
